user_query: I'm planning a trivia night with my friends and we need some interesting questions. Can you provide us with a variety of trivia questions from different categories like art, science, and history? We would appreciate it if you could limit the results to 10 questions.

TaskList.description: Request trivia questions from various categories including art, science, and history.
Receive and aggregate trivia questions for the trivia night.
Format the trivia questions for easy reading and presentation.
